body_html: I think the input pipeline is getting slower. I am sure if I do away with TFRecords and queues and feed the sparse matrix directly, processing using scipy or some other python library, it's been running faster earlier, though it was single threaded and may not be using all the logical cores concurrently.

body: I think the input pipeline is getting slower. I am sure if I do away with TFRecords and queues and feed the sparse matrix directly, processing using scipy or some other python library, it's been running faster earlier, though it was single threaded and may not be using all the logical cores concurrently.
